# INTERIOR::IS_INTERIOR_SCENE

## Summary
Chscks if the game is in an interior

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Can be used to stop certain cheats activating.
